EmailTemplate.subject: Anne Hammond via MBO Partners (1382972136.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Bob, My name is Sara Conde and I work with Anne Hammond at MBO Partners. Anne would like to run her project through MBO and since we already have a master service agreement in place all we would need is for you to complete and sign this statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> for Anne so we have all the information needed to bill. Please let me know if you have any questions. I look forward to continuing our relationship with you. Best, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
